entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 50 km/h gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:05 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 8:05 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
